scripts.prepare:framework: cd framework && pnpm i && npm run build
scripts.prepare:services: cd services && pnpm i && npm run build
scripts.prepare:vue: cd vue && pnpm i && npm run build
scripts.pnpm:devPreinstall: (npm run prepare:framework & npm run prepare:services & npm run prepare:vue) && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.setup:vue: (npm run add:framework & npm run add:services & npm run add:vue) && pnpm i
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:tsbuildinfo
scripts.watch: npm run watch:framework & npm run watch:services
